data.comment: The match has started at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Orlando in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Orlando in the half of Miami.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of Miami.
Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Orlando advance rapidly upfield but Armando Villarreal blows for offside.
Goal kick for Orlando at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Throw-in for Orlando at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Throw-in Orlando.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nani for Orlando drives towards goal at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Miami.
In the minute 10, Important block from the Orlando defence as Nicolas Figal fires in a strike for Miami.
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Julian Carranza gives Miami a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 12, Great play from Rodolfo Pizarro to set up the goal.
Free kick Miami.
Throw-in for Miami close to the penalty box.
In the minute 16, Orlando have a goal kick.
Daryl Dike gets an equalizer for Orlando. The score is now 1-1.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
In the minute 21, In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Miami's Julian Carranza scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Ben Sweat.
In the minute 24, Armando Villarreal awards the home team a throw-in.
Miami pushes forward through Nicolas Figal, whose finish on goal is saved.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Orlando will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Miami.
Ruan (Orlando) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Armando Villarreal awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Orlando have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Miami.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Miami.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 44, Joao Moutinho for Orlando gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Armando Villarreal awards Miami a goal kick.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, At Inter Miami CF Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Armando Villarreal signals a Miami throw-in in Orlando's half.
Throw-in for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Fort Lauderdale.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Oscar Pareja (Orlando) is making a first substitution, with Chris Mueller replacing Junior Urso.
In the minute 47, Orlando have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Goal kick for Orlando at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 48, Goal! Rodolfo Pizarro extends Miami's lead to 3-1.
Rodolfo Pizarro hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Fort Lauderdale for Miami.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Miami.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Miami in the half of Orlando.
Free kick Orlando.
In the minute 53, Ben Sweat (Miami) gets a yellow card.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 54, Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Orlando at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 59, Miami needs to be cautious. Orlando have an attacking throw-in.
Miami push forward at Inter Miami CF Stadium and Nicolas Figal gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Orlando defence.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Orlando.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Matias Pellegrini (Miami) has received a yellow card from Armando Villarreal.
The match at Inter Miami CF Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Andres Reyes, who is down injured.
In the minute 64, Andres Reyes is back on the pitch.
Miami's Rodolfo Pizarro breaks free at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Armando Villarreal awards Orlando a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 66, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Julian Carranza (Miami) has received a first yellow card.
Miami have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, The away team have replaced Oriol Rosell with Tesho Akindele. This is the second substitution made today by Oscar Pareja.
Chris Mueller (Orlando) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick in a good position for Orlando!
In the minute 70, Orlando's Nani gets in a shot on goal at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Orlando drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 73, Orlando's Chris Mueller goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of Miami.
Armando Villarreal signals a Orlando throw-in in Miami's half.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Brek Shea is replacing Matias Pellegrini for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
The home team replace Lewis Morgan with Mikey Ambrose.
In the minute 77, Diego Alonso is making the team's third substitution at Inter Miami CF Stadium with Dylan Nealis replacing Andres Reyes.
Goal! Nani (Orlando) scores with a header to reduce the deficit to 3-2.
Chris Mueller instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 81, Orlando make their fourth substitution with Andres Perea replacing Jhegson Mendez.
Oscar Pareja is making the team's third substitution at Inter Miami CF Stadium with Benji Michel replacing Ruan.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 83, In Fort Lauderdale Orlando drive forward through Nani. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
Orlando have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Free kick Orlando.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for Miami, close to Orlando's area.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Armando Villarreal awards Miami a goal kick.
Goal kick for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Orlando in Fort Lauderdale.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
That's full-time at Inter Miami CF Stadium. The final score is 3-2.
The away team have replaced Mauricio Pereyra with Robinho. This is the fifth substitution made today by Oscar Pareja.
Miami's Brek Shea has been booked in Fort Lauderdale.
Jerome Kiesewetter is replacing Julian Carranza for the home team.
